医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
专家敦促新政府宣布全国卫生和护理紧急状态英国医学杂志NHS未来委员会的第一份报告中的专家表示，选举后的政府应宣布全国卫生和医疗紧急状态，呼吁社会各界帮助改善医疗、护理和福祉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Expert-urge-new-government-to-declare-a-national-health-and-care-emergency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Expert-urge-new-government-to-declare-a-national-health-and-care-emergency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=394712f4-2285-4f8a-9a1d-2540f7e4914a Wed, 31 Jan 2024 17:08:00 -0500
每天吃三份泡菜可以降低男性肥胖风险发表在开放获取期刊《BMJ Open》上的研究发现，每天吃三份韩国经典泡菜可能会降低男性肥胖的总体风险，而萝卜泡菜与降低男女中腹部肿胀的发生率有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Eating-up-to- Three-daily-kimchi-servings-could-reduce-obesity-risk-in-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Eating-up-to- Three-daily-kimchi-servings-could-reduce-obesity-risk-in-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6d06199-007f-4528-b3f6-bac9853199d3 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 17:01:21 -0500 Eating up to three daily kimchi servings could reduce obesity risk in men
机器学习可以为急性失代偿性心力衰竭患者提供个性化利尿治疗最近的一项研究由德克萨斯心脏研究所三年级心血管疾病研究员 Matthew Segar 博士与人合着，由他的研究和住院医师导师、德克萨斯大学西南医学中心的 Ambarish Pandey 博士领导，该研究利用了基于机器学习的方法识别、理解和预测急性失代偿性心力衰竭（ADHF）患者利尿反应的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Machine-learning-could-personalize-diuretic-treatment-for-病人-with-acute-decompensated-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Machine-learning-could-personalize-diuretic-treatment-for-病人-with-acute-decompensated-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56f18ca2-53c4-488b-9c40-324b6b956fcb Wed, 31 Jan 2024 16:56:28 -0500 Machine learning could personalize diuretic treatment for patients with acute decompensated heart failure
研究发现产前物质暴露与儿童心理健康之间的联系一项观察性研究发现，产前物质接触与 10 至 12 岁儿童的心理健康之间存在联系，但也发现，控制环境和遗传可以消除许多关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Study-finds-links- Between-prenatal-substance-exposure-and-childhood-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Study-finds-links- Between-prenatal-substance-exposure-and-childhood-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c71cf428-fc91-4a17-a1b4-64326330d6bb Wed, 31 Jan 2024 16:51:01 -0500 Study finds links between prenatal substance exposure and childhood mental health
社交媒体上积极的身体形象提高了男性和女性的身体满意度萨里大学的一项新研究报告称，在社交媒体上接触积极的身体形象可以提高男性和女性的身体满意度，并减少对体重的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Body-positive-images-on-social-media-boost-body-satisfaction-for-men-and-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Body-positive-images-on-social-media-boost-body-satisfaction-for-men-and-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b889dad-1287-4137-b5b3-642bbc41e52e Wed, 31 Jan 2024 16:46:00 -0500 Body positive images on social media boost body satisfaction for men and women
研究称，电子游戏可能会提高医生的支气管镜检查技能视频游戏对医学生和住院医师支气管镜检查技能的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Bronchoscopy-skills-of-medics-may-improve-with-video-gaming-says-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Bronchoscopy-skills-of-medics-may-improve-with-video-gaming-says-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d048f27c-06e3-44fa-9106-271770084cbf Wed, 31 Jan 2024 10:08:00 -0500 Bronchoscopy skills of medics may improve with video gaming, says study
生命早期的高饮食质量与降低 IBD 风险相关《肠道》杂志在线发表的一项大型长期研究表明，一岁时的高质量饮食可能会抑制随后患炎症性肠病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/High-diet-quality-in-early-life-linked-with-reduced-risk-of-IBD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/High-diet-quality-in-early-life-linked-with-reduced-risk-of-IBD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f479674-b699-4c8c-8039-156b2aff5944 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 08:06:18 -0500 High diet quality in early life associated with reduced risk of IBD
基于人工智能的个性化癌症医学应用和相关监管挑战：概述个性化疗法可以改善未来许多疾病的治疗。近年来，癌症医学尤其取得了重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/AI-based-applications-for-personalized-cancer-medicine-and-lated-regulatory-challenges-An-overview.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/AI-based-applications-for-personalized-cancer-medicine-and-lated-regulatory-challenges-An-overview.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=322f4d14-f857-4454-beb0-f5ce0113ad81 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 07:58:16 -0500 AI-based applications for personalized cancer medicine and related regulatory challenges: An overview
深度学习工具在通过超声成像诊断乳腺癌方面是否优于人类？与临床环境中的人类读者相比，深度学习 (DL) 使用超声波 (US) 诊断乳腺癌的准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Do-deep-learning-tools-outperform- humans-in-diagnosing-breast-cancer-via-ultrasound-imaging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Do-deep-learning-tools-outperform- humans-in-diagnosing-breast-cancer-via-ultrasound-imaging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1467b371-dd7f-4643-83e9-b855a5fe10ff Wed, 31 Jan 2024 07:56:00 -0500 Do deep learning tools outperform humans in diagnosing breast cancer via ultrasound imaging?
新举措旨在改变医疗机构中阿尔茨海默病的诊断和治疗方式AD-RIDDLE 联盟的成员今天宣布，他们将启动一项新计划，旨在弥合阿尔茨海默病研究、实施科学和精准医学之间的差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/New-initiative-aims-to-transform-how-Alzheimers-disease-is-diagnosed-treatment-across-healthcare-settings.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/New-initiative-aims-to-transform-how-Alzheimers-disease-is-diagnosed-treatment-across-healthcare-settings.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82fea59b-6bc1-45e9-a28b-a448c25d7f62 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 07:40:01 -0500 New initiative aims to transform how Alzheimer's disease is diagnosed, treated across healthcare settings
